EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your registration is confirmed for Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<!--
-->
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for your registration. Here are your confirmation details:
Accelerate 2015 October 22nd, 2015 9 a.m. – 10 p.m. Vienna, Austria We are looking forward to see you there.
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Events Team
